module.name: Filestore
module.changelog: *17.0.2.34* #539 filestore ftp instance enabled on restore *17.0.2.33 FREEI-1467 Fixing undefined method error *17.0.2.32 Github #546 and Github #539 Fixing backup and restore issues *17.0.2.29 Adding SFTP option for FTP type of filestore instance *17.0.2.23 Adding S3 storage class option *17.0.2.22 bump *17.0.1alpha1* Initial release
